page.title: 10TOURISM, LOWESWATER
page.content: Tourism in the form of holiday accommodation accounts for a high degree of activity in this area. Listed are the various kinds of accommodation and their average prices per person per week: HOTELS - Scalehill @ Â£210 INN - Kirkstyle @ Â£200 HOLIDAY COTTAGES - Melbreak Cottage, High Thrushbank, Low Thrushbank Farmhouse, Watergate Cottage, High Cross, Rose Cottage, Oak Cottage, Netherclose, Scalehill Hotel Holiday Flats @ Â£25; Bed & Breakfast - The Vicarage, Foulsyke, Lanthwaite Gate Farm, Jenkin Hill @ Â£52.50 GUEST HOUSE (Licensed) - Lanthwaite Gate @ Â£95
